definition: music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Sometimes story, take on the piano chords try.
sentences.chinese: 有时也煞有介事，拿着简谱在钢琴上摩拳擦掌。

sentences.english: To our surprise, she was good enough to play many songs just by seeing the numbered musical notation.
sentences.chinese: 令我们惊讶的是，她看着简谱就能吹好多歌曲了。

sentences.english: This page is for all the Mandarin songs. All the songs have complete lyrics and song chords .
sentences.chinese: 所有歌曲都附上完整的歌词和歌曲简谱。

definition: to notate music/to write a score
traditional Chinese musical notation using Chinese characters to represent musical notes
names of the notes of a musical scale (e.g. C, D, E or do, re, mi)
(music) fingering/(TCM) manipulation of acupuncture needles/(keyboard) typing technique/(dance) hand movements/(painting) finger method
to indicate the phonetic value of a word using other words
